title: Who controls Venezuela's oil now? What Maduro's arrest means for energy markets

title: U.S. Oil Blockade Forces Venezuela's PDVSA to Slash Production
summary: Venezuela’s state oil firm PDVSA has started reducing oil production and has asked its joint ventures, including those with Chevron, to also cut output, as storage space is running out amid the U.S. naval blockade and oil export embargo.
